scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 sass/style.scss assets/css/style.css
scripts.js-compile: shx cat node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js js/nl.js js/form-validation.js js/mobile-menu.js js/navbar.js > assets/js/web.js
scripts.watch-css: nodemon --ignore www/ --ignore js/  -e scss -x "npm run css"
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --ignore www/ --ignore sass/ -e js -x "npm run js"
